content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 32-39)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Facility at (16.0, 71.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### Copper Ore Mining and Smelting Facility at (-46.0, 71.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### New Iron Ore Mining Facility at (30.0, 70.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### Iron Processing Facility at (36.0, 74.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### Partial Iron Processing Setup at (37.0, 73.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### New Iron Processing Line at (36.0, 91.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### Direct Smelting Setup at (38.0, 72.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### New Iron Processing Line at (37.0, 88.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (37.0, 88.0) facing DOWN
- Stone furnace at (38.0, 90.0)
- Output wooden chest at (39.5, 90.5)

### New Iron Processing Line at (38.0, 86.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (38.0, 86.0) facing DOWN
- Stone furnace at (39.0, 88.0)
- Output wooden chest at (40.5, 88.5)

### New Iron Processing Line at (37.0, 73.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (37.0, 73.0) facing DOWN
- Stone furnace at (38.0, 75.0)
- Burner inserter at (39.5, 75.5)
- Output wooden chest at (40.5, 75.5) containing 3 iron plates

### New Iron Processing Line at (38.0, 72.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (38.0, 72.0) facing DOWN
- Stone furnace at (39.0, 74.0)
- Output wooden chest at (40.5, 74.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Placement collision errors (recurring)
- Verify target positions are clear before placing entities (occurred at (39.0,75.0))
- Check for existing entities at target positions before placing new ones
- Increase spacing between entities to avoid placement conflicts

### Direct connection problems (expanded)
- Avoid connecting mining drills directly to furnaces without inserters (causes "output blocked" warnings)
- Always use inserters between mining drills and furnaces for reliable operation
- Verify inserter directions match the required item flow direction
- Ensure proper spacing between connected entities (1 tile gap recommended)

### Operational issues (expanded)
- Address "output blocked" warnings by providing valid output destinations
- Resolve "no ingredients" warnings by ensuring proper material supply chains
- Monitor furnace fuel levels to prevent interruptions in smelting
- Verify chest positions are accessible to inserters (1.5 tile offset recommended)

### Building verification (new)
- Always verify entity connections after placement
- Check relative positions of connected entities (drill drop positions vs furnace inputs)
- Confirm inserter pickup/drop positions match intended flow direction

## NAMESPACE

No functions have been defined by the agent yet.
